name: Fonefixed
tag_list: mobile-phone-repair, mobile-phone-recycling, phone-repairs, buy-phone, sell-phone, mobile-phone, phone, repair, wirral, local
overview:
Fonefixed Mobile Phone Repairs provides a modern innovative approach to mobile phone repairs and recycling. Based Birkenhead, Wirral

Our business philosophy is “simple, smart, efficient” This means our clients don’t get blinded by complex terminology.

Fonefixed Wirral is rapidly growing and becoming highly respected in the industry because of our unique services to businesses

Fonefixed Wirral just get on and produce the results you want. Each client is valued and is treated on a personal and bespoke basis.

Emergency / Contract Phone Repair If a staff member breaks a mobile phone, provide same day / next day (dependant on location) mobile phone repair. The price per phone repair is fixed low depending on the number of handsets in the business. You can even add personal mobile phones to the contract, so the more you have, the lower the cost. All repairs carry our full warranties

Mobile Phone Refurbishment Benefit from the huge potential cost savings by merely refurbishing existing mobile phones. Instead of new network contract extensions with the price of costly handsets built in, reduce your network costs significantly by making what you already have, like new.

Bulk Mobile Phone Recycling – Paying cash for unwanted mobile phones, Even recycle broken phones . Offering the most competitive prices in the market. Working with Charities, schools and local fundraisers to provide an innovative solution to raising money.

Bulk Mobile Phone Repairs – Repairing up to 500+ mobile phones per week, With a UK based repair centre and each phone tested prior to return
